title: Mechanistic approaches for crosstalk between nanomaterials and plants: plant immunomodulation, defense mechanisms, stress resilience, toxicity, and perspectives
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, 11,2324-2351
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00053F, Critical Review
Ragini Singh, Pinky Choudhary, Santosh Kumar, Hemant Kumar Daima
This review provides new insights for the development of nanomaterials with potential immunomodulatory effects in plants towards resistance against biotic and abiotic stresses.
